info.name: DOKU MY API Collection
info.description:
**DOKU MY Postman Collection** is a collection of Postman requests designed to help developers explore, test, and integrate with **DOKU Malaysia (MY) APIs**.

It provides ready-to-use examples for key API flows, including authentication, checkout, and payment processing, allowing developers to quickly understand request structures, required parameters, and expected responses.

item.name: Checkout API

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl --location --request POST 'https://dev.your-api-server.com/v3/checkouts' \
--header 'Authorization: Base64(doku_ak_test_qblFNYngBkEdjEZ16jxxoWSM:)' \
--header 'Client-Id: BRN-001-0000001' \
--header 'Request-Timestamp: {{$date.isoTimestamp}}' \
--header 'Idempotency-Id;' \
--header 'Signature;' \
--header 'API-Version: arabica.2025-12-01' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "id": "8fdC56eo-cC99-46E1-B6AC-4asD8755B25C",
    "order": {
        "amount": 100.05,
        "invoice_number": "INV-20210231-0001",
        "currency": "MYR"
    }
}'

Generated from cURL: curl --location 'https://api-sit.doku.com/v3/checkouts/1768276092408' \
--header 'Authorization: Basic YW55LWFwaS1rZXktMTIz' \
--header 'Client-Id: BRN-0204-1766128384799' \
--header 'Request-Timestamp: {{request_timestamp}}' \
--header 'API-Version: arabica.2025-12-01'

item.description:
Checkout is a payment service that allows you as DOKU merchants to use our payment system, where DOKU's payment page pops up on your website after checkout. This is the easiest and the quickest way to integrate with DOKU without any hassles that suitable for every business needs from small businesses to enterprises.  
  
Learn more [here](https://doku-developers.apidog.io/overview-1926303m0).

item.name: Payment API

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl --location 'https://api-doku.com/v3/payments/internet-banking/banks' \
--header 'api-version: arabica.2025-06-19' \
--header 'Request-Target: {{request_target}}' \
--header 'Request-Timestamp: {{request_timestamp}}' \
--header 'Signature: {{signature}}' \
--header 'Idempotency-Id: test' \
--header 'Authorization: Basic dGVzdC1hcGktbWVueWFsYWFhYWEtMTIz' \
--header 'Client-Id: BRN-0216-1758091011041' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
    "payment_channel": "INTERNET_BANKING_FPX"
}'

Generated from cURL: curl --location 'https://api-sit.doku.com/v3/payments/1768275476502' \
--header 'Authorization: Basic YW55LWFwaS1rZXktMTIz' \
--header 'Client-Id: BRN-0204-1766128384799' \
--header 'Request-Timestamp: {{request_timestamp}}' \
--header 'API-Version: arabica.2025-12-01'

item.description:
The Payment API is a unified direct payment API that supports multiple payment channels through a single endpoint. Merchants specify the desired payment channel in the request payload, allowing full customization of the payment flow and user experience.  
  
Learn more [here](https://doku-developers.apidog.io/overview-1926304m0).
